title: QUANTUM hypnotic experience / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
One of Dr. Marco Paret's successful students from his masterclass demonstrates incredible quantum hypnosis. She learned non-verbal hypnosis Fascination - the power of the gaze and Mesmerism by Dr. Marco Paret and now her subjects enter in deep hypnotic trance states, that transform them positively and forever. The subject entered in a state of hypnotic ecstasy. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
